H0.text: where does the zambezi river start. Lake Tanganyika

H1.text: where does the zambezi river start. Kasama

H2.text: where does the zambezi river start. Mbala

H3.text: where does the zambezi river start. Mwinilunga

A4.text: The Zambezi River rises 50 km north of Mwinilunga.

A5.text: The river rises in a black, marshy dambo at about 1,524 metres above sea level.
